title.narrative: CDPD/Collaboration between people with disabilities and public authorities at local level to facilitate implementation of accessibility pol

description.narrative: The project objective is to facilitate the implementation of accessibility policyby increasing the degree of collaboration between people with disabilities and public authorities in local and central level. The project is mobilizing and empowering 12 peopl e with disabilities and civic activists from 6 regions (municipalities) of the country (North Centre South including UTA Gagauzia- Edinet Leova Orhei Causeni Comrat Ceadir Lunga) to actively participate in the and implementation of accessibility policy. Th e goal is that collaboration of people with disabilities and their representative organizations with local and central public authorities to implement accessibility policy. Local activists will be trained and local initiative groups formed. Groups together with CRPDs regional coordinators carry out the task of assessing the level of accessibility of local infrastructure. Local initiative groups report their findings for local public authorities and create an action plan for improving the accessibility. Also groups will monitor the accessibility aspect of the current infrastructure projects and send requests for elimination of non-conformitities. Also the organisation will collaborate with Technical Surveillance Agency and train designers and project examine rson accessibility norms and standards. Also organisation publishes articles about the project and aims getting mass media attention for accessibility.The organisation emphasizes that this is inclusive project whose beneficiaries are not only people with m obility disabilities. Instead wide audience will benefit of increasing accessibility in infrastructure projects:elderly people small children parent's with baby strollers. The outcome goal of the project is to promote human rights and respect of them. Peop le with disabilities have right to participate in public life and decision making. The project aims to improve accessibility respecting differences and taking personal differences into account in municipal infraastructure reconstructions. The organisation underlines that accessibility doesn't cost anything but it requires the changes in attitudes and ways of reconstructing infrastructure. The organisation is one of the leading organisations in the work of rights of people with disabilities in Moldova. The o rganisation offers legal aid for people with disabilities and is leading the advocacy work of the sector in Moldova.
